title: New Committer Workflow - Apache Kafka - Apache Software Foundation
content:
See
https://community.apache.org/pmc/adding-committers.html
for the official reference.
After you have accepted your invitation to become an Apache Kafka committer, there are a few housekeeping items required.
Sign and submit your ICLA to the ASF secretary
Read instructions here
https://www.apache.org/licenses/contributor-agreements.html#clas
Download, print, and sign the ICLA
Scan and email signed ICLA to
secretary@apache.org
Wait for your Apache ID
Reset your password as indicated
Join the ASF organization with your GitHub account
Confirm that you have access
Add yourself to the committers on kafka-site
Read the committer-tools README
